comment.body: The site is one of serious circucmventor watching all our activities. Adding any cosmetic filter for those placeholder or leftover is either equal to giving them next material to break the page by themselves, or bloating our list by a rule that lives for only few hours.

comment.body: @Alex-302 Piano anti-adb triggers only if DNS filtering is enabled and only on Android (no problem with AG for Win with DNS filtering). It seems DNS filtering interferes redirecting `npttech.com/advertising.js` to noopjs.

comment.body:
> @sh0ou Can you please check if adding
> 
> ```
> snrec.jp#$#body { overflow: visible !important; }
> snrec.jp#$#body div.fc-ab-root:not(#style_important) { display: none !important; }
> ```
> 
> to User rules fixes the issue?

No. can't fix. 
The appearance does not change.
